name: fall stripes throw blanket
sizes_available: lapghan, small throw, large throw, twin, full, queen, king, california king,
notes:
this is a free pattern on my website.
https://www.windingroadcrochet.com/crochet-throw-blanket-pattern/

or you can purchase the pdf pattern above to have a neat clean printer-friendly large font ad-free version of the pattern.

the pattern is written in english using us terms.

pattern level: easy
this pattern uses the chain, half double crochet, working in back loops only, yarn over slip stitch

materials needed:
super bulky yarn (size 6)
10 mm crochet hook
yarn needle and scissors

this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download, not a finished product. please make sure to download adobe reader at www.adobe.com if you do not already have it on your computer.
